Question2.question_title: I Solemnly Swear That I Am Up To No Good
Question2.question/prompt: Find the hidden message within the attached image. The decryption password is winter2021ctf.

Question3.question/prompt: What Linux command would you use to get the output of the file 'ctfstuff'?

Question4.question/prompt:
Which 3-digit value will allow the following permissions on a file:
-The file can be executed and written to by the user that owns the file
-The file can be read by the group that owns the file
-The file can be executed by everyone else

Question5.question/prompt: What one Linux command would you use to append the word 'hello' to the file 'world'?

Question6.question/prompt: Where is user information stored within the linux file system? Flag format: /answer/answer
hints: often used to see all the users on a system
